response.original_title: Putting Down Roots: The DL Hall Story
response.overview: A story of triumph, setbacks, and pure grit, Putting Down Roots: The DL Hall Story covers Orioles LHP DL Hall and his journey making it to the Major Leagues. Hear from Hall’s parents Stacey Cooper and Stevie Hall, friends Justin Williams and Wesley Veal, and high school coach Bart Shuman, all of whom had a major impact on Hall’s career. From Valdosta, Georgia, to Baltimore, Maryland, Hall’s story is one you don’t want to miss.
response.title: Putting Down Roots: The DL Hall Story
